title: Ward Skin Bug
body: Just obtained the holiday penguin ward skin from a hextech box! but when I try to change my ward skin, it does not show up on the list, as well as a few other ward skins that I already own! I'm also not able to switch to ward skins that are visible and I have already purchased either.. Reset the launcher multiple times and still doesn't show up. Please halp  :'(

replies.body: Since you can change your ward in Champion Select now, you have to use that; Legacy/Limited Ward Skins will not show up in the Store either, the same as Legacy/Limited champion skins won't.

This is correct. 

All the wards you own will show up in the Ward Selection Panel in Champion Select. 

As Deep Terror Nami mentioned, only content currently available shows in the shop. In addition, for normal skins in the Champion Details Page, only skins that aren't legacy will show (unless you own them).
